subtitle: The pearl barley in this dish adds a wonderful texture and makes this a filling meal.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large heatproof casserole dish. Add half the prepared oxtail and fry for 8-10 min, until lightly browned on all sides. Remove from the heat and set aside. Fry the remainder as before for 8-10 min and set aside.

Add the onions, carrots and celery to the pan and fry for 5 min, stirring frequently. Stir in the flour and cook for 1 min. Gradually stir in the stock, wine and herbs until all are incorporated. Season to taste. Bring to the boil.
Add the oxtail, cover and cook in the oven for 1 days, stirring occasionally.

Remove from the oven. Stir in the pearl barley, cover and cook for 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> - 2hrs, or until the meat is very tender. Skim any fat from the surface. Adjust the seasoning. Sprinkle with thyme and serve.

title: Celery braised oxtail with white wine
